contract_details.description: Comprehensive file consolidation mission focusing on organizing repository structure, eliminating redundant files, and creating a clean, maintainable file hierarchy that supports efficient development workflows.
contract_details.background: Agent-2 specializes in infrastructure and file organization. This contract addresses the critical need for repository consolidation to improve development efficiency and maintainability.
objectives: Analyze current repository structure and identify consolidation opportunities
Eliminate duplicate and redundant files across the codebase
Reorganize file hierarchy for better logical grouping
Consolidate scattered utility files into organized modules
Create consistent file naming conventions and patterns
Optimize file sizes and remove unnecessary content
Document repository structure and organization guidelines
Validate file consolidation doesn't break dependencies
deliverables: Repository structure analysis and consolidation report
Organized file hierarchy with logical groupings
Consolidated utility modules and shared libraries
File naming convention standards and documentation
Repository organization guidelines and best practices
technical_requirements: File system analysis and organization tools
success_criteria: Repository file count reduced by >40% through consolidation
File hierarchy organized with clear logical groupings
Duplicate files eliminated across all directories
File consolidation maintains all system dependencies
Repository structure documentation complete and accessible
Zero functionality regressions from file reorganization

dependencies: Repository analysis completed for file structure
File system access and modification permissions
Version control system operational for file moves
resources_required: File system analysis and organization tools

network_unlocks: Access to File Organization Working Group
File System Optimization Best Practices Group

contract_history.details: Created file consolidation and organization contract for Agent-2 (High Priority)
